DOC.brief_title: Contrast-inDuced nephRotoxicity Assessed KIdney Load-to-DAmage RElationship
DOC.detailed_description: We previously demonstrate slope relationship plot individual iodine load contrast-induced serum creatinine change ( load-to-damage relationship , LDR ) characterize intrinsic nephrotoxicity contrast may allow reliable comparative evaluation among small size study group randomize different contrast medium . The aim present study compare , assessment LDR slope , intrinsic nephrotoxicity two different contrast medium use serum cystatin-C change LDR dependent variable .
DOC.criteria: Patients candidate coronary angiography and/or angioplasty Baseline creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min Patients STEMI Patients shock Known allergy contrast medium Prior contrast administration within 1 month Current use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug
